[Request] Mod - Kerbal Training System

Hi all,

If there is a modder out there with the ability to code a mod that adds a feature to allow money or science to train kerbals.

The training would increase their star experience by one level each time they are admitted to the training centre and would cost money most likely and a time requirement. Also, it would be great if there was an ability to train a kerbal to switch their specialty ie. scientist to pilot

I think this would be a neat feature.

Cheers,

Training kerbals sounds neat, although I envision it would have to be a significant cash investment. As to the skill-change part:

Also, it would be great if there was an ability to train a kerbal to switch their specialty ie. scientist to pilot

As mentioned in another thread here, it seems to be impossible at this point as the skills are hard-coded to the kerbals names.

This would make a lot of sense if added.

I mean, you don't sent random people off the street to space with no prior training in real life, anyways.
not to ressurect threads from the dead but, i think this has changed from impossible to possible? so requist seconded!
